text: @WHO @WHOEMRO @WHOWPRO @pahowho @WHOAFRO @WHOSEARO @WHO_Europe @ladygaga @GlblCtzn @DrTedros @UN_News_Centre Hey #JTS join this historic event and let’s rock together tonight in the fight against #COVID19. 5pm PDT/ 8pm EDT. Internationally, this will be aired on @BBC on Sunday April 19th. #OneWorldTogetherAtHome #makesomenoise @ladygaga @aliciakeys @KeshaRose @Oprah @Hozier @pepsi 🌎❤️ https://t.co/cqNz3jArJW

entity.name: iHeart Living Room Concert for America
entity.description: Elton John hosts the one-hour benefit special in response to the COVID-19 pandemic; performers include Alicia Keys, Backstreet Boys and Billie Eilish.

entity.name: One World: Together at Home
entity.description: Global Citizen presents One World: Together at Home, a global special curated in collaboration with Lady Gaga and featuring your favorite artists and comedians — all in support of the World Health Organization (WHO) and the health care workers on the frontlines of the COVID-19 crisis⁠.
